author: craigmcc
msg: Update the Application Developer's Guide and sample scripts to by default
include the JAXP parser classes on the compiler classpath.

author: craigmcc
msg: Document the requirement for the JSSE classes to build Tomcat 3.2, and to run
it if you are using the SSL connector.
